name: XplatGenerateReleaseNotes
description: Generates a release notes file in a format of your choice from the build or release history
author: Black Marble

inputs.name: outputfile
inputs.label: Output file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Markdown file to export e.g. $(Build.ArtifactStagingDirectory)/releasenotes.md if within a build workflow

inputs.name: outputVariableName
inputs.label: Output variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable that the markdown output should be assigned to for use later in your workflow.

inputs.name: templateLocation
inputs.label: Template Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the template file source, file in source control or in line.

inputs.name: templatefile
inputs.label: Template file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Markdown template.

inputs.name: inlinetemplate
inputs.label: Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Markdown template.

inputs.name: checkStage
inputs.label: Check Stage
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true a comparison is made against the last build that was successful to the current stage, or overrideStageName if specified (Build Only, for this to work the stage name must be unique in the pipeline)

inputs.name: overrideStageName
inputs.label: Name of stage (override)
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set uses this stage name to find the last successful deployment, as opposed to the currently active stage

inputs.name: stopOnRedeploy
inputs.label: No generation on re-deploy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do not generate release notes of a re-deploy. If this is set, and a re-deploy occurs the task will succeeds with a warning

inputs.name: sortCS
inputs.label: Sort CS
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true will Changeset/Commits by data, if false then it will leave them in the API default order

inputs.name: sortWi
inputs.label: Sort WI
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true will sort work items by type, if false then it will leave the work items in default order

inputs.name: showOnlyPrimary
inputs.label: Show Primary only
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true only show WI/CS associated with primary release artifact

inputs.name: searchCrossProjectForPRs
inputs.label: Cross Project For PRs
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true will try to match commits to Azure DevOps PR cross project within the organisation, if false only searches the Team Project

inputs.name: gitHubPat
inputs.label: GitHub PAT
inputs.helpMarkDown: To expand commit messages stored in a private GitHub repos a PAT needs to be provided, it is not required for repo stored in Azure DevOps or public GitHub repos

inputs.name: bitbucketUser
inputs.label: Bitbucket User
inputs.helpMarkDown: To expand commit messages stored in a private Bitbucket repos a user and app secret need to be provided, it is not required for repo stored in Azure DevOps or public Bitbucket repos

inputs.name: bitbucketSecret
inputs.label: Bitbucket App Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: To expand commit messages stored in a private Bitbucket repos a user and app secret need to be provided, it is not required for repo stored in Azure DevOps or public Bitbucket repos

inputs.name: dumpPayloadToConsole
inputs.label: Dump Payload to Console
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true the data objects passed to the file generator is dumped to the log

inputs.name: dumpPayloadToFile
inputs.label: Dump Payload to File
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true the data objects passed to the file generator is dumped to a JSON file

inputs.name: dumpPayloadFileName
inputs.label: Payload Dump File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The filename to dump the data objects passed to the file generator

inputs.name: replaceFile
inputs.label: Replace the output file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Replace the output file

inputs.name: appendToFile
inputs.label: Append to end of the output file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Append to end of file in the output file if not replacing file

inputs.name: customHandlebarsExtensionCode
inputs.label: Custom Handlebars Extension
inputs.helpMarkDown: A custom Handlebars extension written as a JavaScript module e.g. module.exports = {foo() {return 'Returns foo';}};

inputs.name: customHandlebarsExtensionFile
inputs.label: Custom Handlebars Extension File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The filename (without extension) for any custom Handlebars extension written

inputs.name: customHandlebarsExtensionFolder
inputs.label: Folder for Custom Handlebars Extension
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder to save custom Handlebars extension file. If empty defaults to customHandlebarsExtensionFolder the agents temp folder '${process.env.AGENT_WORKFOLDER}/_temp'

inputs.name: getParentsAndChildren
inputs.label: Find related WI
inputs.helpMarkDown: Find the parents and child workitems for any workitems associated with a build

inputs.name: getAllParents
inputs.label: Find all Parent WI
inputs.helpMarkDown: Find the parents all workitems associated with a build, recursing back to workitem with no parents e.g. up to Epics

inputs.name: tags
inputs.label: Tags
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma separated list of pipeline tags that must all be matched when looking for previous successful builds, only used if checkStage=true

inputs.name: overridePat
inputs.label: Override Pat
inputs.helpMarkDown: It is possible to inject a Personal Access Token to use in place of the Build Agent OAUTH token. This option will only be used in very rare situations usually after a support issue has been raised

inputs.name: overrideBuildReleaseId
inputs.label: Override Build/ Release ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: For releases or multi-stage YAML this parameter provides a means to set the ID of the 'last good release' to compare against. If the specified release/build is not found then the task will exit with an error. Default is empty/not set disabling this override behaviour

inputs.name: getIndirectPullRequests
inputs.label: Get Indirect Pull Requests
inputs.helpMarkDown: If enabled an attempt will be made to populate a list of indirectly associated PRs i.e PR that are associated with a PR's associated commits

inputs.name: maxRetries
inputs.label: Max. Retries
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of time to retry any REST API calls that timeout. Set to zero for no retries, defaults to 20

inputs.name: pauseTime
inputs.label: Pause Time
inputs.helpMarkDown: No longer used, but left in to avoid breaking YAML builds

inputs.name: stopOnError
inputs.label: Stop on Handlebars Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: If enabled will stop the pipeline if there is a Handlebars template error, if false the task will log the error but continue

inputs.name: considerPartiallySuccessfulReleases
inputs.label: Consider Partially Successful Release
inputs.helpMarkDown: If enabled both successful and partial successful release will be considered when looking for historic releases

inputs.name: checkForManuallyLinkedWI
inputs.label: Check for Manually Linked WI
inputs.helpMarkDown: By default WI associated manually with a build/release will not appear in release notes. If this parameter is true they will be added.

inputs.name: wiqlWhereClause
inputs.label: WIQL Where Clause
inputs.helpMarkDown: A where clause to get a get a list of work items using a WIQL Query e.g. `[System.TeamProject] = 'Project Name' and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Product Backlog Item'`. Note you cannot use the all the @ parameter such as `@project`, `@currentIteration` or `@Me`, but `@Today` works.

inputs.name: wiqlFromTarget
inputs.label: WIQL From Target
inputs.helpMarkDown: The FROM target for the WIQL Query.  e.g. `SELECT [System.Id] FROM workitems WHERE ...`

inputs.name: getPRDetails
inputs.label: Find associated PRs
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true all PRs in the project, or organisation, will be scanned for associations. There is an option to disable this feature as this scan is slow and not always required (Default true)

inputs.name: getTestedBy
inputs.label: Find Tests associated to WI
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true any Test Case WIs linked to associated WIs by a 'Tested By' relation will be added to the 'testedByWorkItems' array (Default true)

instanceNameFormat: Generate Release Notes based on Release Comparison API
